attributes.action: No tax for for essential workers during COVID 19 outbreak.
attributes.additional_details: Due to staff sickness, additional pressures and the need to keep the country going in this period of uncertainty many essential and frontline workers will have to work additional shifts putting themselves and their loved ones at risk. Say thank you by not taking a lump of their pay in taxes. This will allow some form of relief for the staff when the crisis relents.
attributes.background: Dont make essential workers pay tax on overtime due to COVID 19 outbreak.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
